description: When Christopher described himself on the phone as being 6'7? tall, working out 7-10 hours a week and wearing a size 14 shoe, we figured that just finding out if everything was in proportion would be worth the price of admission alone.Even better, after meeting him in person, Christopher proved to be a smart, friendly very likeable guy who had a quiet sexuality simmering just under the surface. His dick seems to have two states: hard and harder. Add to that being extra thick with one of those ?heavy hangs? that always looks so edible. Nor was he shy when it came to showing off his jock ass including a nice tight closeup of ?center court.?After you see him in action, you too will learn that ?the bigger they are, the harder they fall? should really be ?the taller they are, the bigger the load.?.
title: Basket Balls, Scene #01
